Detailed Description

template<class DataType>
class DzTArray< DataType >

A template class which embodies an array style list.

This class is used to store an array of items that must have a copy constructor called when copying objects to a new space.

template<class DataType>
int DzTArray< DataType >::appendIfUnique ( const DataType &  obj  ) 

If the given item is not in the array, it will be appended to the end of the array, otherwise, the array remains unchanged.

Returns:
The index of the item ( or the first-encountered identical item ) in the array.

template<class DataType>
void DzTArray< DataType >::clear (  )  [inline, virtual]

Removes all items from the list. Actually it just sets the number of items in the list to zero without freeing any space.

template<class DataType>

The total number of elements in array.
template<class DataType>
int DzTArray< DataType >::find ( const DataType &  obj  )  const
Returns:
The index of the object in the array, or -1 if the object is not found in the array. This function works by using the "==" operator to compare objects.
template<class DataType>
const DataType * DzTArray< DataType >::getValues (  )  const [inline]

A pointer to the actual data.
template<class DataType>
DataType * DzTArray< DataType >::getValuesUnlocked (  )  const [inline]
Returns:
A pointer to the actual data. Be careful not to alter the size of the returned array of objects. This pointer may not be valid after calls that alter that array.
